riddles.question: Enter the game code to begin
Find the area in block units for wall A. Round to the nearest whole block.
Four the types of animals on the walls and shelves.  The 1st letter for each animal rearranged names a small decorative object.
The order of Math can be challenging.  The well worn name of math orders can be found in Entry 3 to get closer to your escape!
The key to this hiding place gives birth to big things.
riddles.hint: Don't crack up when you find it

riddles.question: This symbol is IRONic.  Coin the clue found below.
As leader 44, he was born August 4. 12 months later the Taubinator was too.  Taubinator's year is a winning combination.
Entering the room number will complete your escape!
riddles.hint: You don't need any more hints at this point
